animated_text: Transforming Vision Into Reality Through Coding and Design.
developer_description: As an experienced full-stack developer, I am committed to transforming ideas into innovative web applications. Explore my latest projects and articles, showcasing my expertise in React.js and web development.
biography_paragraph_1: Hi, I'm Marek, a web developer with a year of experience in creating functional and user-friendly digital solutions. I pride myself on delivering projects that are not only visually appealing but also solve real problems and provide smooth user experiences.
biography_paragraph_2: I believe that great design is more than just looks - it's about creating solutions and enjoyable interactions. My interests extend across various digital mediums, from websites to mobile apps, where I apply my commitment to design excellence and user-centric principles.
biography_paragraph_3: In every project, I strive to use my skills and enthusiasm to realize your vision. I'm eagerly looking forward to bringing my knowledge and fresh perspective to your next project.
workDescriptionGeeknauts: I worked on web and mobile application development both in a team and independently; as part of a team, I collaborated on complex projects for various clients, and in solo roles, I managed the full spectrum of development tasks from concept to completion.
workDescriptionRabeSoft: I took on the role of a frontend engineer for the mobile DinnerDate app, focusing on enhancing user interface and experience. My work involved implementing interactive design elements and ensuring seamless functionality across various devices.
workDescriptionVisualSoft: I was the sole frontend developer for the Smartkid app, leveraging React Native for cross-platform functionality and Fastlane for streamlined deployment. My work involved building a rich user interface and integrating key features using modern tools like Firebase and Redux for robust app performance.
workDescriptionEternis: During the development of the Eternis website, I employed Next.js and Strapi for efficient performance and content management. My contribution also involved implementing Chakra UI to achieve a responsive and user-friendly interface.
batchelor: Batchelor Of Science In Computer Science
batchelorInfo: Relevant courses included Data Structures and Algorithms, Computer Systems Engineering, and Artificial Intelligence
masters: Master of Science in Computer Science Specialization in Cybersecurity
mastersInfo: Master's coursework included hands-on experience with security assessment and penetration testing tools such as Nmap, SonarQube, Burp Suite, emphasizing practical approaches to vulnerability analysis and network security.
